misc.author: kenneth_cleys
misc.post: I am trying to find a home for an 8′ by 5′ picture of the frontal image of the shroud what is called a negative positive. Ihad gotten this thru a priest name FATHER FILAS it has a specially constucted stand that goes with it. It is considered a 3rd generation picture. Iuse to give talks on it and use this as one of my props. Ilive in Woodridge, Illinois a western suburb of Chicago..
misc.title: The Wabash Shroud of Turin Museum
